blogs.title: MY FIRST BLOG
blogs.body: My brother's words echo in my mind: "Challenges won't get easier, Aman. You get stronger." This philosophy has become my compass, guiding every decision I make. After completing eighth grade, I chose a highly competitive high school, a rigorous environment where only the top 5% of the city's students were selected. It was a deliberate jump, a mountain I wanted to climb.
blogs.author: FIKIREMARIYAM BABU
